subject: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Friend,
Good News for you, it's been a while.
How are you  and your family doing?
I want you to know that I finally succeeded in getting out the cash
boxes into the USA.
I have deposited $2.5m as your compensation for  all your assistance
trying to help get out the cash to a safe location all these years.
Thanks to you my good friend.
Quickly contact CBI WALLET with your full names , and they will open
your wallet and fund you immediately as I have instructed. You will
receive this compensation
payment in crpto-currency from CBI Wallet Company.  Therefore, Contact
CBI Wallet official as below.
CBI WALLET
Contact Name: Mr. Peter C. Ming
Direct Email:  
cbi.petercming@gmail.com
Yours Sincerely,
Major Briggs Eugene

subject: Re:    Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Major Briggs Eugene,

Wow, that's some news! I'm glad to hear you've managed to get the cash boxes into the USA. My family and I are doing well, thank you for asking. 

I'm curious about this CBI Wallet you mentioned. Can you tell me more about it? How does it work exactly? And how did you come across this company?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Friend

I appreciate your kind words. The CBI Wallet is a secure digital wallet
that facilitates international transactions. It ensures smooth and
efficient fund transfers. I came across it through research and
recommendations.

Due to the high volume of documentation and greed by some corrupt officials
who have made our funds to be pending the idea of using the CBI wallet
through bitcoin came in and it is very fast . So you are to contact them so
a CBI wallet will be opened for you to get your compensation which will
also be sent to you after you have opened the account with them without any
hitch for any agencies
Best regards,
Major Briggs Eugene

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Major Briggs Eugene,

Thank you for your message. The CBI Wallet sounds like a very interesting concept. I'm always eager to learn about new technologies and ways to transfer funds efficiently.

You mentioned that it came about due to high volume and some corrupt officials. Could you please elaborate more on this? How does the CBI Wallet help in such situations?

Also, how exactly does one go about opening an account with them? Is there a specific process or requirements needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Michael
